title: Lamp Head (IndieGala) Giveaway
description: Claim a free copy of Lamp Head via IndieGala! Lamp Head is a small indie game where you play as a strange man with a lamp in his head.
instructions:
1. Login into your free IndieGala account.
2. Scroll down and click the "Add to Your Library" button to add the game to your library.
3. Go to "My Library" to find your game .
